text: David Joseph Margulies (February 19, 1937 - January 11, 2016) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as the Mayor of New York City in Ghostbusters and in Ghostbusters II and as Neil Mink in The Sopranos. Margulies died in Manhattan, New York from unknown causes at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * David Margulies at Internet Broadway Database * Category:1937 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Brooklyn
title: David Margulies
